00045 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 //
00047 // CLASS: uvm_component
00048 //
00049 // Base class for structural UVM elements.
00050 // Derives from sc_module, and provides name, and hierarchy information.
00051 //
00052 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 
00060 class uvm_component : public sc_core::sc_module, public uvm_typed {
00061 public:
00062   friend class uvm_manager;
00063 
00064   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065   // Constructors and destructor
00066   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00068   uvm_component(sc_core::sc_module_name nm);
00069   virtual ~uvm_component();

00071   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072   // get_type_name   -- Required override
00073   //
00074   // Return the type name of this class - e.g., "my_component".
00075   // Inherits this pure virtual method from base class uvm_typed.
00076   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078   virtual std::string get_type_name() const = 0;
00079 
00080   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081   // Find out if a child with this leaf name exists.
00082   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00092   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093   // Set up configuration.
00094   //
00095   // The configuration settings will be stored in a table inside
00096   // this component.
00097   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 
00099   template <typename T> void set_config_int(
00100     const std::string& instname,
00101     const std::string& field,
00102     const T& val
00103   );
00104   void set_config_string(
00105     const std::string& instname,
00106     const std::string& field,
00107     const std::string& val
00108   );
00109   void set_config_object(
00110     const std::string& instname,
00111     const std::string& field,
00112     uvm_object* val,
00113     bool clone = true
00114   );
00115 
00116   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117   // Get configurations.
00118   //
00119   // A get_config_xxx() call will look for a corresponding set_confiog_xxx()
00120   // call. The search will be done starting from the global configuration
00121   // table, and continuing in each component's configuration table in 
00122   // the parent hierarchy, in a top-down order.
00123   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 
00125   template <class T> bool get_config_int(
00126     const std::string& field,
00127     T& val
00128   );
00129   bool get_config_string(
00130     const std::string& field,
00131     std::string& val
00132   );
00133   bool uvm_get_config_string(
00134     const std::string& field,
00135     std::string& val
00136   );
00137   bool get_config_object(
00138     const std::string& field,
00139     uvm_object*& val,
00140     bool clone = true
00141   );
00142

00144   // Interfaces to UVM factory.

00147   // uvm_factory.

00151     std::string type_name,

00170   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171   // Pre-run phase - build().
00172   //
00173   // build() is an alias for the existing sc_module phase
00174   // before_end_of_elaboration().
00175   // Other pre-run phases are inherited from sc_module.
00176   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 
00178   virtual void end_of_construction(); 
00179   virtual void build(); // synonym for before_end_of_elaboration;
00180   virtual void build_phase(uvm_phase *phase = NULL);
00181   virtual void connect_phase(uvm_phase *phase = NULL);
00182   virtual void before_end_of_elaboration(); 
00183   virtual void end_of_elaboration();
00184   virtual void end_of_elaboration_phase(uvm_phase *phase = NULL);
00185   virtual void start_of_simulation();
00186   virtual void start_of_simulation_phase(uvm_phase *phase = NULL);
00187 
00188   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00189   // Pre-run phase - connect()
00190   //
00191   // connect() is a UVM-SC specific phase
00192   // It does not exist in sc_module.
00193   // Other pre-run phases are inherited from sc_module.
00194   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00195 
00196   virtual void connect();
00197 
00198   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00199   // The run phase.
00200   //
00201   // The main thread of execution.
00202   // The component should not declare run as a thread process - it is
00203   // automatically spawned by uvm_component's constructor.
00204   // Run phase ends either by the uvm_stop_request() protocol
00205   // or by a timeout that can be customized by calling
00206   // uvm_set_global_timeout().
00207   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 
00209   virtual void run_phase(uvm_phase *phase); 
00210   virtual void run(); 
00211   virtual void reset_phase(uvm_phase *phase); 
00212   virtual void configure_phase(uvm_phase *phase); 
00213   virtual void main_phase(uvm_phase *phase); 
00214   virtual void shutdown_phase(uvm_phase *phase); 
00215 
00216   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00217   // Stop mechanism to veto termination triggered by uvm_stop_request().
00218   //
00219   // If enable_stop_interrupt() returns true, then the stop() member method 
00220   // will be spawned as a thread process when uvm_stop_request() is 
00221   // invoked in the design.
00222   // Simulation will not stop until all the stop process return.
00223   // The component should not declare stop() explicitly as a thread process.
00224   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00225 
00226   virtual void stop(); 
00227   virtual bool enable_stop_interrupt();
00228 
00229   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00230   // Post-run phases.
00231   //
00232   // These phases will trigger after the run phase ends.
00233   // Usually after the post-run phases are over, sc_stop() is  
00234   // issued, which wll trigger the end_of_simulation() phase also. 
00235   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236 
00237   virtual void extract_phase(uvm_phase *phase);
00238   virtual void extract();
00239   virtual void check_phase(uvm_phase *phase);
00240   virtual void check();
00241   virtual void report_phase(uvm_phase *phase);
00242   virtual void report();
00243   virtual void final_phase(uvm_phase *phase);
00244 
00245   virtual void phase_started(uvm_phase *phase);
00246   virtual void phase_execute(uvm_phase *phase);
00247   virtual void phase_ready_to_end(uvm_phase *phase);
00248   virtual void phase_ended(uvm_phase *phase);
00249 
00250   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00251   // Issue process control constructs on run() process.
00252   //
00253   // For those simulators that support process control constructs, 
00254   // the corresponding construct will be issued on the run() process
00255   // handle. A value of false is returned if a simulator does not
00256   // support process control constructs.
00257   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258 
00259   virtual bool kill();
00260   virtual bool reset();
00261   virtual bool suspend();
00262   virtual bool resume();
00263   virtual bool disable();
00264   virtual bool enable();
00265   virtual bool sync_reset_on();
00266   virtual bool sync_reset_off();
00267   // cannot use virtual with templated member method
00268   template <typename T>
00269   //virtual bool throw_it(T& t);
00270   bool throw_it(T& t);
00271 
00272   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00273   // Objection interface
00274   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00275 
00276   // Function: raised
00277   //
00278   // The raised callback is called when a decendant of the component instance
00279   // raises the specfied ~objection~. The ~source_obj~ is the object which
00280   // originally raised the object. ~count~ is an optional count that was used
00281   // to indicate a number of objections which were raised.
00282 
00283   //virtual void raised (uvm_objection *objection, uvm_component *source_comp, int count) {};
00284 
00285 
00286   // Function: dropped
00287   //
00288   // The dropped callback is called when a decendant of the component instance
00289   // raises the specfied ~objection~. The ~source_obj~ is the object which
00290   // originally dropped the object. ~count~ is an optional count that was used
00291   // to indicate a number of objections which were dropped.
00292 
00293   //virtual void dropped (uvm_objection* objection, uvm_component* source_comp, int count) {};
00294 
00295 
00296   // Function: all_dropped
00297   //
00298   // The all_dropped callback is called when a decendant of the component instance
00299   // raises the specfied ~objection~. The ~source_obj~ is the object which
00300   // originally all_dropped the object. ~count~ is an optional count that was used
00301   // to indicate a number of objections which were dropped. This callback is
00302   // time-consuming and the all_dropped conditional will not be propagated
00303   // up to the object's parent until the callback returns.
00304 
00305   //virtual void all_dropped (uvm_objection* objection, uvm_component* source_comp, int count) {};
00306 
00307   void set_run_handle(sc_core::sc_process_handle h);
00308   void set_reset_handle(sc_core::sc_process_handle h);
00309   void set_configure_handle(sc_core::sc_process_handle h);
00310   void set_main_handle(sc_core::sc_process_handle h);
00311   void set_shutdown_handle(sc_core::sc_process_handle h);
00312 
00313   virtual void config_callback(std::string cntxt, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc);
00314   virtual void rsrc_callback(uvm_rsrc_action action, std::string inst_name, std::string field_name, uvm_resource_base * rsrc);
00315 
00316 protected:
00317   sc_core::sc_process_handle m_run_handle;
00318   sc_core::sc_process_handle m_reset_handle;
00319   sc_core::sc_process_handle m_configure_handle;
00320   sc_core::sc_process_handle m_main_handle;
00321   sc_core::sc_process_handle m_shutdown_handle;
00322 
00323 private: 
00324   std::string prepend_name(std::string s);
00325 };

00329 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00330 // Templated functions necessary to support get_config_int()
00331 //
00332 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00333 #define uvm_get_nbits_type(t) \
00334 inline unsigned int uvm_get_nbits(const t& v) { \
00335   return (8 * sizeof(v)); \
00336 }
00337 uvm_get_nbits_type(bool)
00338 uvm_get_nbits_type(char)
00339 uvm_get_nbits_type(sc_dt::uchar)
00340 uvm_get_nbits_type(short)
00341 uvm_get_nbits_type(ushort)
00342 uvm_get_nbits_type(int)
00343 uvm_get_nbits_type(uint)
00344 uvm_get_nbits_type(long)
00345 uvm_get_nbits_type(ulong)
00346 uvm_get_nbits_type(sc_dt::int64)
00347 uvm_get_nbits_type(sc_dt::uint64)
00348 
00349 inline unsigned int uvm_get_nbits(const sc_dt::sc_bv_base &v) {
00350   return v.length();
00351 }
00352 
00353 inline unsigned int uvm_get_nbits(const sc_dt::sc_logic &v) {
00354   return 1;
00355 }
00356 
00357 template <typename T> void uvm_convert_from_bv(T& v, sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv) {
00358   v = bv; 
00359 }
00360 inline void uvm_convert_from_bv(sc_dt::sc_logic& v, const sc_dt::sc_bv_base& bv) { \
00361   v = bv.get_bit(0);
00362 }
00363 #define uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(t) \
00364 inline void uvm_convert_from_bv(t& v, const sc_dt::sc_bv_base& bv) { \
00365   sc_dt::uint64 u = bv.to_uint64(); \
00366   v = u;  \
00367 }
00368 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(bool)
00369 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(char)
00370 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(sc_dt::uchar)
00371 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(short)
00372 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(ushort)
00373 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(int)
00374 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(uint)
00375 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(long)
00376 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(ulong)
00377 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(sc_dt::int64)
00378 uvm_convert_from_bv_int_type(sc_dt::uint64)
00379 // and similarly for char, unsigned, ...

00382 
00383 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00384 // Templated functions necessary to support set_config_int()
00385 //
00386 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00387 
00388 template <typename T> sc_dt::sc_bv_base uvm_convert_to_bv(const T& v) {
00389   int nbits = uvm_get_nbits(v);
00390   sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv(nbits);
00391   bv = v;
00392   return bv;
00393 }
00394 inline sc_dt::sc_bv_base uvm_convert_to_bv(const sc_dt::sc_logic& v) {
00395   sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv(1);
00396   bv.set_bit(0,v.value());
00397   return bv;
00398 }
00399 
00401 
00402 template <typename T> void uvm_component::set_config_int(
00403   const std::string& instname,
00404   const std::string& field,
00405   const T& val
00406 ) {
00407 
00408   int nbits = uvm_get_nbits(val);
00409   sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv(nbits);
00410 
00411   bv = uvm_convert_to_bv(val);
00412   uvm_config_db<sc_dt::sc_bv_base>::set(this, instname, field, bv);
00413 }
00414 
00415 template <typename T> bool uvm_component::get_config_int(
00416   const std::string& field,
00417   T& val
00418 ) {
00419   bool result;
00420   int nbits = uvm_get_nbits(val);
00421   sc_dt::sc_bv_base bv(nbits);
00422 
00423   result =  uvm_config_db<sc_dt::sc_bv_base >::get(this, "", field, bv);
00424   if (result)
00425     uvm_convert_from_bv(val, bv);
00426 
00427   return result;
00428 }

00431 
00432 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00433 // Registration macros to register an uvm_component with the factory.
00434 // 
00435 // A registration macro should be invoked outside the uvm_component class
00436 // declaration.
00437 // A registration macro registers the given uvm_component with the factory, and
00438 // defines the get_type_name() member method of the registered component.
00439 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00440 
00441 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00442 // Use the macro below to register a simple non-templated uvm_component.
00443 // The macro argument is the name of the class.
00444 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the macro argument.
00445 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00446 
00447 #define UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER(t) \
00448 static int uvm_component_register_dummy_##t = \
00449   uvm::uvm_factory::register_component_creator( #t,new t::uvm_component_creator_##t()); \
00450 inline std::string t::get_type_name() const { return #t; }
00451 
00452 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00453 // Use the macro below to register a simple non-templated uvm_component,
00454 // with a different registered name (first argument) than its
00455 // class name (second argument).
00456 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the first macro argument.
00457 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00458 
00459 #define UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_ALIAS(name,t) \
00460 static int uvm_component_register_dummy_##name##_##t = \
00461   uvm::uvm_factory::register_component_creator( #name,new t::uvm_component_creator_##t()); \
00462 inline std::string t::get_type_name() const { return #name; }
00463 
00464 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00465 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_components with
00466 // one template parameter.
00467 // The first macro argument is the class name, and the second macro argument
00468 // is a specific value of the template parameter.
00469 // Example usage: "UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T(mycomp, int)".
00470 // The registered name with the factory is a concatenation of the first
00471 // and second arguments, separated by "_".
00472 // e.g., "mycomp_int".
00473 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00474 
00475 #define UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T(t,T) \
00476 static int uvm_component_register_dummy_##t##_##T = \
00477   uvm::uvm_factory::register_component_creator( #t "_" #T, new t<T>::uvm_component_creator_##t()); \
00478 template<> inline std::string t<T>::get_type_name() const { return #t "_" #T; }
00479 
00480 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00481 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_components with
00482 // one template parameter, when you do not want the default registered name.
00483 // Specify the alternate registration name as the first macro argument.
00484 // Example usage: "UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T_ALIAS(myname, mycomp, int)".
00485 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the first macro 
00486 // argument.
00487 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00488 
00489 #define UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T_ALIAS(name,t,T) \
00490 static int uvm_component_register_dummy_##name##_##t = \
00491   uvm::uvm_factory::register_component_creator( #name, new t<T>::uvm_component_creator_##t()); \
00492 template<> inline std::string t<T>::get_type_name() const { return #name; }
00493 
00494 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00495 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_components with
00496 // two template parameters.
00497 // The first macro argument is the class name. 
00498 // The second and third macro arguments are specific values of the
00499 // two template parameters.
00500 // Example usage: "UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T2(myothercomp, int, int)".
00501 // The registered name with the factory is a concatenation of the first,
00502 // second, and third arguments, separated by "_". 
00503 // e.g., "myothercomp_int_int".
00504 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00505 
00506 #define UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T2(t,T1,T2) \
00507 static int uvm_component_register_dummy_##t##_##T1##_##T2 = \
00508   uvm::uvm_factory::register_component_creator( #t "_" #T1 "_" #T2, new t<T1,T2>::uvm_component_creator_##t()); \
00509 template<> inline std::string t<T1,T2>::get_type_name() const { return #t "_" #T1 "_" #T2; }
00510 
00511 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00512 // Use the macro below for registering templated uvm_components with 
00513 // two template parameters, when you do not want the default registered name.
00514 // Specify the alternate registration name as the first macro argument.
00515 // Example usage: 
00516 //   "UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T2_ALIAS(myname, myothercomp, int, int)".
00517 // The registered name with the factory is the same as the first macro argument.
00518 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00519 
00520 #define UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER_T2_ALIAS(name,t,T1,T2) \
00521 static int uvm_component_register_dummy_##name##_##t = \
00522   uvm::uvm_factory::register_component_creator( #name, new t<T1,T2>::uvm_component_creator_##t()); \
00523 template<> inline std::string t<T1,T2>::get_type_name() const { return #name; }
00524 
00525 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00526 // Utility macro to instrument an uvm_component such that it can be registered
00527 // with the factory.
00528 // 
00529 // The utility macro should be invoked inside the uvm_component class
00530 // declaration.
00531 // The utility macro declares
00532 // - the uvm_component_creator_<classname> class used by the factory
00533 //   to create an instance of this component.
00534 // - the get_type_name() member method inside the uvm_component class.
00535 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00536 
00537 #define UVM_COMPONENT_UTILS(t) \
00538 class uvm_component_creator_##t : public uvm::uvm_component_creator { \
00539 public: \
00540   uvm::uvm_component* create(const std::string& name) { \
00541     uvm::uvm_component* _ncsc_comp = new t(name.c_str()); \
00542     return _ncsc_comp; \
00543   } \
00544 }; \
00545 virtual std::string get_type_name() const;
00546 
00548 
00549 } // namespace uvm
